name: English
title: Miza's Raidfinder v
news: ★ Please report any bug to me or on Github, thanks
req_outdated:
❌ Python modules are outdated.
Use the 'Req. Update' button or check the 'readme.txt' file.
update_raid:
A new Raid List is available.
Update now?
update_error: An unexpected error occured, try again later.
update_main:
Version {} is available.
Open the download link?
status_desc: Indicate if the Twitter Stream is connected.
filter_desc: Only the tweets containing this string will be processed
setting_pause_desc: If enabled, the stream is paused.
setting_jp_desc: If disabled, japanese tweets will be discarded.
setting_en_desc: If disabled, english tweets will be discarded.
setting_sound_desc: If enabled, a sound will play when a new code is available.
setting_copy_desc: If enabled, the latest code will be copied to your clipboard.
button_last_desc: Put the latest raid code in the clipboard.
setting_dupe_desc:
If enabled, codes already in memory will be skipped.
A code is added to the memory only if the corresponding raid is selected.
Up to 200 codes are stored in memory. Once reached, the 50 oldests are discarded.
setting_time_desc: If enabled, all new timestamps in the log will be using the tweet creation time, instead of the current time.
setting_limit_desc: If enabled, will reduce the tweet usage. Check README.txt for details.
setting_second_desc: If enabled, the previous code will be copied instead of the latest one.
setting_jst_desc: If enabled, the clock and all timestamps will be converted to JST.
setting_update_raids_desc: If enabled, the raidfinder will search for a newer version of raid.json on startup.
setting_update_raidfinder_desc: If enabled, the raidfinder will search for a newer version of itself on startup.
setting_tooltip_desc: If disabled, tooltips such as this one will not show up.
button_raidlist_desc:
Reload the content of 'raid.json'.
Current selected raids will be discarded.
button_version_desc: Open up the download link to the latest version in your browser.
button_github_desc: Open up the link to the project Github.
req_install:
'requirements.txt' update has been attempted, try to restart the app.
If it failed, you'll continue to get the outdated notification on startup.
In that case, please refer to the 'readme.txt' file
lang_msg:
The Raidfinder language has been changed.
Please restart the application.
stat_time_desc:
Duration of your connection to twitter.
Pauses are ignored.
stat_received_desc: Number of tweets received by the listener.
stat_matched_desc: Number of received tweets correponding to the user selected raid(s).
stat_ratio_desc: Ratio of selected raid tweets by all received tweets.
stat_filter_desc: Numbed of tweets blocked by the filter.
stat_delay_desc: Delay between the tweet creation and its reception by the listener.
stat_matched_rate_desc: Average reception speed for the selected raids.
stat_received_last_desc: When was received the last tweet.
stat_matched_last_desc: When was received the last tweet corresponding to a selected raid.
err_reload_raid_ui_1: ❌ Something went wrong while building the raid UI
twitter_restart: ★ Restarting the Twitter Stream in 10 seconds...
err_auth:
❌ Failed to start the Twitter Stream
If you haven't set your Token, check README.txt.
Or check your internet connexion.
exception_timeout: ❌ Communication issue, check your internet connection or Twitter server status
err_empty_token:
First time user?
Please follow the instructions in README.txt to set your Twitter bearer token and restart the application.
limit_info: ★ Waiting for a raid to be selected
